name: A Simple Night
description:
My @lgbtincomics secret santa gift to @katekaned =D Happy holydays \o/ A tiny game about Kate and Mags family celebrating Hanukkah, hope it make you happy ^^

Made with GBStudio.

How to play:
Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
